sentences.en: Beware, she means ill , despite her solicitous manner.
sentences.cn: 你要当心, 尽管她装出一付很关心人的样子, 她是存心不良的.

sentences.en: Fayed was solicitous, seeing him three or four times a week.
sentences.cn: 法耶德很关心他, 每周要见他三四次.

sentences.en: He was attentively solicitous to her after her running away.
sentences.cn: 自从她出走以来,他对待她变得殷勤周到了.

sentences.en: He was so solicitous of his guests.
sentences.cn: 他对他的客人们非常关切。

sentences.en: He was solicitous about lighting her cigarette and inquiring as to her comfort.
sentences.cn: 他殷勤地替她点燃了烟,问她是否舒服.

sentences.en: He was very solicitous for her safe return.
sentences.cn: 他心神不定,祈望她平安归来.

sentences.en: I am solicitous of his help.
I was still by nature solicitous to be neat.
Knowing that the end was so near, she became rather solicitous.
sentences.cn: 她知道这一切即将结束, 反倒变得很有些放心不下了.

sentences.en: Our hero was very solicitous about his descendants.
sentences.cn: 我们的主人公是非常关心他的子孙后代的.

sentences.en: She is so solicitous and persistent that she virtually kills you with kindness.
sentences.cn: 她非常关心而固执,以致她的善意实际上反而使人感到尴尬.

sentences.en: The scrutiny he bent on her was most solicitous.
sentences.cn: 他弯腰仔细打量她时,那样子是最最考究的.

sentences.en: They were solicitous for their son's health.
They were very solicitous and attentive to detail.
sentences.cn: 他们非常细心,十分注意细节.

words.tran_cn: 热切期望的；热心的；挂念的

trans.tran_cn: 关心的，挂念的，热切的，渴望的
trans.tran_en: very concerned about someone’s safety, health, or comfort
